content: this english only 21 page pdf crochet pattern has loads of pictures to show you how to crochet your very own vulpix difficulty this pattern does not teach you how to crochet this is a great pattern for adventurous beginner to intermediate crocheters the pattern will take a few days to a few weeks to complete depending on how much you crochet at the end of the pattern you will have approximately a 10 inch tall vulpix depending on gauge terms and techniques us terms - magic_ring/magic_ring - single_crochet - increase - invisible decrease - crochet in back loops only - working in continuous rounds - invisible bind off and invisible finish - basic sewing skills - felting with a felting needle materials required not included - aran/worsted weight size 4 yarn - recommended paintbox simply aran in soft fudge 209 x2 and coffee bean 210 red heart soft in cinnabar - 3 0mm crochet hook - polyester fiberfill stuffing - stitch marker - small yarn/darning needle - scissors - felt in white black beige/cream brown and dark brown - sewing needle with thread to match each felt colour - pins to hold pieces in place while sewing - felting needle - wire brush - flat iron
